question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. yellow taxi
B. yellow store sign on the left
C. None
D. None

options.B: yellow store sign on the left

triage_reason: The yellow taxi is in the foreground, partially obscuring the view of the store sign, which is on a building further back, making the depth relationship very obvious.
